医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
化学遗传学揭示了有前景的抗新冠化合物《药学报 B》的这篇新文章讨论了通过化学遗传学鉴定新型 SARS-CoV-2 小分子抑制剂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/Chemical-genics-uncovers-promising-anti-COVID-compounds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/Chemical-genics-uncovers-promising-anti-COVID-compounds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4c53c7bc-d3fb-487a-a932-ca0f4b2ecf34 Wed, 25 Sep 2024 13:33:26 -0400 Chemical genetics uncovers promising anti-COVID compounds
研究强调预防性健康技术对消费者福祉的复杂影响预防性健康技术——例如腕戴式活动追踪器或健康和健身应用程序——是促进健康的流行工具，但《消费者事务杂志》发表的新研究表明，消费者对这些技术的参与可以被视为一把双刃剑剑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/Study-highlights-mixed-impact-of-preventive-health-technologies-on-consumer-wellbeing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/Study-highlights-mixed-impact-of-preventive-health-technologies-on-consumer-wellbeing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8dfab200-b061-4f14-845d-13d5935dad5d Wed, 25 Sep 2024 13:29:43 -0400
地震后果与月经不规律发生率较高有关在《大脑与行为》杂志上发表的研究中，研究人员发现，生活在 2023 年土耳其地震影响地区的女性月经不规律的比例有所增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/Earthquake-aftermath-linked-to-higher-rates-of-menstrual-irregularities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/Earthquake-aftermath-linked-to-higher-rates-of-menstrual-irregularities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97915fc7-261c-415e-afcb-a8743816e19f Wed, 25 Sep 2024 13:22:34 -0400 Earthquake aftermath linked to higher rates of menstrual irregularities
新的深度学习算法预测罕见遗传变异的影响我们是否易患特定疾病在很大程度上取决于我们基因组中无数的变异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/New-deep-learning-algorithm-predicts-effects-of-rare-genic-variants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/New-deep-learning-algorithm-predicts-effects-of-rare-genic-variants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=272547e0-02e4-4884-a844-0bb90ee5e96f Wed, 25 Sep 2024 10:43:44 -0400 New deep learning algorithm predicts effects of rare genetic variants
细胞外囊泡在大脑发育中发挥关键作用细胞外囊泡（EV）是细胞释放的微小气泡，充当细胞交换信号并进行通信的货船。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/Extracellular-vesicles-play-key-role-in-brain-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/Extracellular-vesicles-play-key-role-in-brain-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9652f487-eb95-485d-980f-32ed5ba97380 Wed, 25 Sep 2024 10:14:00 -0400 Extracellular vesicles play key role in brain development
优化的纳米佐剂增强了卵巢癌的原位肿瘤疫苗Acta Pharmaceutica Sinica B 的这篇新文章讨论了分子胶如何通过增强 DDB1 和 PHGDH 之间的相互作用来触发 PHGDH 的降解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/Optimized-nanoadjuvants-enhance-in-situ-tumor-vaccine-for-ovarian-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/Optimized-nanoadjuvants-enhance-in-situ-tumor-vaccine-for-ovarian-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=66eddcfb-3433-4b46-a53c-12c3d689c580 Wed, 25 Sep 2024 09:33:12 -0400 Optimized nanoadjuvants enhance in situ tumor vaccine for ovarian cancer
新型鼻喷雾剂有望预防呼吸道感染发表在《先进材料》上的新研究报告了一种用于预防呼吸道感染的新型鼻喷雾剂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/Novel-nasal-spray-shows-promise-in-preventing-respiratory-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/Novel-nasal-spray-shows-promise-in-preventing-respiratory-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15b5b64a-f4f4-4d2a-bed3-d784c57c5cc7 Wed, 25 Sep 2024 09:15:48 -0400 Novel nasal spray shows promise in preventing respiratory infections
有效减少儿童肥胖的餐盒和健康食谱健康食谱和补贴餐盒对帮助儿童肥胖有很大帮助。这些是哥德堡大学进行的一项研究的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/Meal-boxes-and-healthy-recipes- effective-in-reducing-child-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/Meal-boxes-and-healthy-recipes- effective-in-reducing-child-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=614b58e3-db79-483b-8432-98fda5e278e4 Wed, 25 Sep 2024 08:58:00 -0400 Meal boxes and healthy recipes effective in reducing child obesity
研究人员对发烧期间免疫细胞如何对热做出反应有了新的认识研究表明，适度发烧可增强 CD4 T 细胞活性，同时减少调节性 T 细胞抑制，凸显温度的免疫效应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/Researchers-gain-new-understanding-of-how-immune-cells-respond-to-heat-during-fever.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/Researchers-gain-new-understanding-of-how-immune-cells-respond-to-heat-during-fever.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3195de1-309b-4866-a3c0-dc3a932188bc Wed, 25 Sep 2024 07:43:00 -0400 Researchers gain new understanding of how immune cells respond to heat during fever
联合治疗以增强肺癌的肿瘤反应弗朗西斯·克里克研究所的研究人员与 Revolution Medicines 合作，在患有肺癌的小鼠身上测试了多种治疗方法，结果表明，这些方法可以使免疫疗法针对无反应的肿瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/Combining-treatments-to-boost-tumor-response-in-lung-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/Combining-treatments-to-boost-tumor-response-in-lung-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7db9cd45-b21d-4ece-a754-421db82d6ec3 Wed, 25 Sep 2024 07:42:00 -0400 Combining treatments to boost tumor response in lung cancer
